title: Global industrial robot market : key companies by related revenue 2017
yAxis: Industrial robot revenue in million euros
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Companies, and Industrial robot revenue in million euros in each Companies on the y axis.
Companies ABB has the highest Industrial robot revenue in million euros and KUKA has the lowest Industrial robot revenue in million euros.
There is a difference of 5619.0 between the maximum Companies ABB and minimum Companies KUKA.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Companies in the x axis and Industrial robot revenue in million euros in the y axis.
The Industrial robot revenue in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Companies ABB and lowest at Companies KUKA.

max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Companies, and Industrial robot revenue in million euros in each Companies on the y axis.
Companies ABB has the highest Industrial robot revenue in million euros and KUKA has the lowest Industrial robot revenue in million euros.
The second highest Industrial robot revenue in million euros is appeared to be the Companies Omron.
The difference of Industrial robot revenue in million euros between the highest and lowest Companies is 5619.0.
Industrial robot revenue in million euros at Companies ABB is 6819.0 , second place is Omron at 3010.0, and thirdly is Fanuc at 1730.0.
Similar Industrial robot revenue in million euros is found in Companies KUKA, and Yaskawa.
The Companies KUKA has 2.64 times less Industrial robot revenue in million euros than average.
